DateText: late 12th century AH/AD 18th century-13th century AH/AD 19th century
Title: Binding from Collection of Poems (Divan)
Description: This non-original binding from Walters manuscript W.628 may be attributable to late 12th-century AH/AD 18th or 13th-century AH/AD 19th Turkey. The binding is composed of red leather with  scalloped medallion and has gold-tooled decoration and borders.
Keywords: Islamic; Persian; Safavid; Book; Codex; Colophon; Illumination; Illustration; Manuscript; Iran; Sufism; Literature -- Poetry
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown] [Ex libris on upper board inside]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Turkish
